Posts.EditableText:
Hey folks,

I was looking for the launch options for Quest. To be specific:

If I have Game.aslx, and I want to launch that in Play mode by default, is there a launch option that would allow me to do so? Assuming that all of the file associations are in place, etc.
Posts.HTML:
Hey folks,

I was looking for the launch options for Quest. To be specific:

If I have Game.aslx, and I want to launch that in Play mode by default, is there a launch option that would allow me to do so? Assuming that all of the file associations are in place, etc.

Posts.EditableText:
Double clicking on Game.aslx launches Quest...
But, if you Publish the game, the double click on the Game.quest
it will launch the game in "play mode".
Posts.HTML:
